channel.title: [PI] Yell stopped working

item.title: [PI] Yell stopped working
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

My ::yell command stopped working. Here it is:

 if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
                    String rank = "";
                    String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toUpperCase();
                if (c.playerRights == 0) {
                    rank = "[Player]["+ c.playerName +"]:";
                if (c.playerRights == 1) {
                    rank = "[Mod]["+ c.playerName +"]:";
                }
                if (c.playerRights == 2) {
                    rank = "[Admin]["+ c.playerName +"]:";
                }
                if (c.playerRights == 3) {
                    rank = "[Owner]["+ c.playerName +"] : ";
                }
                if (c.playerRights == 4) {
                    rank = "[Player]["+ c.playerName +"]:";
                }        
                for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) {
						Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[j]; 
						c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
		   }
		}
            }

Read full topic
